recipe_name: Spicy penne with olives, tomatoes and spicy sausage
author: Tony Tobin
method: Heat the oil in a pan and fry the sausage and onion until golden-brown. Add the chilli flakes. Add the cherry tomatoes, basil, mozzarella and olives and stir over a low heat for 2-3 minutes. Add the cooked pasta to the sauce and stir well. Divide between two bowls and serve.
ingredients: 1 tbsp olive oil,  4 spicy sausages, chopped,  Â½ onion, finely sliced,  pinch dried chilli flakes,  200g/7oz canned cherry tomatoes,  large handful fresh basil, chopped,  5 mini mozzarella balls, drained,  2 tbsp mixed olives,  250g/9oz fresh penne, cooked according to packet instructions
